legal_basis: Rule 400 of the Federal Courts Rules
application_details: Applicant argued for no costs based on settlement offers and public interest
procedure_followed: Court dismissed the application, Respondent filed a Bill of Costs, Assessment Officer reviewed submissions and evidence
evidence_consideration: specific cost items disallowed due to lack of Court authorization or timing issues
decision_reasoning: Assessment Officer upheld most of the Respondent's costs as reasonable and necessary
